data.title: Sydney Restaurants by Australian Chef, Matt Moran
data.meta_description: Experience culinary magic at Solotel's restaurants. From lunches to meetings, celebrate with family and friends at our diverse dining destinations in Sydney.
data.text:
OUR RESTAURANTS

DISCOVER OUR UNIQUE DINING EXPERIENCES

Our restaurants (co-owned by Matt Moran and the Solomon family – managed by Solotel) are where we bring our mojo, some would say - different gravy. Whether you’re looking for a long lunch with friends, entertaining clients or celebrating with family – there’s a Solotel restaurant for every occasion.

At our restaurants, you are guaranteed to taste great food garnished with attentive service and sip on wine and cocktails that will linger in your memories.

Celebrate special occasions at Aria, our fine dining restaurant in Sydney with sweeping harbour views, appreciate quality produce at Chophouse and tune into Rekōdo Restaurant & Vinyl Bar for a blend of food, drink and music at Barangaroo House. Our chefs cultivate creativity from paddock to plate through seasonally inspired menus - take a stroll through Chiswick’s kitchen gardens, where they pick fresh produce to use daily.

Our award-winning beverage team are constantly evolving our drinks lists, from the incredible cellar at Aria to the refreshing cocktails at North Bondi Fish, our team will mix, shake, pour and serve the perfect drink to suit your mood and match your food.

EXPLORE OUR RESTAURANTS IN SYDNEY

A synergy of many elements, in an unrivalled harbourside location, Aria is one of Australia’s finest Sydney restaurants and has received many awards over the years. The fine dining restaurant in Sydney headed by Chef and Restauranter Matt Moran, brings together the best seasonal produce and a world-class wine list in a stunning, art-filled space with sweeping Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge water views.

With many ingredients grown outside the window in perhaps the suburb's only kitchen garden, the menu at this Matt Moran restaurat is alive to the seasons, always ripe with elegant simplicity and perfect for sharing. Great for a quick bite or a drink, a special celebration or Sunday lunch with the family - Chiswick is a unique Sydney restaurant experience that will keep you coming back for more.

Chophouse champions the very best Australian products and ingredients. We put our beef foot forward: starting with quality means we don't mess with it much. Our predominantly Aussie food menu stars meat from the Moran Family Farm as well as our favourite local suppliers. Many of our meats are dry-aged on the bone for depth of flavour, and our diverse cuts are always perfectly cooked. Visit our beloved Sydney restaurant in the heart of the CBD.

Located a few short steps from the sand and surf of one of the world's most famous beaches, North Bondi Fish is a Bondi at its best. The seafood menu is fresh, light, modern and uncomplicated. The talented kitchen team use only the best produce, working with local suppliers to create an ever-changing menu. People-watch on the balcony with water views and a spritz in hand and watch the sun go down over North Bondi.

Chez Blue is a charming and relaxed neighbourhood French bistrot located in the heart of Rozelle. Former Bistro Moncur head chef, Mark Williamson, leads the kitchen with plenty of favourite French classics as well as a few riffs. The team's knowledge goes beyond plate and glass and spans across the local area; they know their neighbours and remember their orders. Whether it's dinner with friends, a birthday celebration, a quick drink to pass the time or a family meal - Chez Blue welcomes you.
